main event: A farmer spotted a bright light followed by a flat, silvery disk-shaped object over Walnut, Mississippi on April 26, 1952.
interesting points: The object was traveling at a high rate of speed and disappeared from view.
No vapor trail or exhaust was observed.
The sighting was investigated by the Information Liaison Service and assigned to Project Blue Book.
The observers were Mr. G.C. Smith and Audrey Smith.
The report states that based on the descriptions, it is possible the observers sighted a material flying object.
witnesses: Mr. G.C. Smith and Audrey Smith
